reditary neuralgic amyotrophy
How many people are affected by hereditary neuralgic amyotrophy ?,"Hereditary neuralgic amyotrophy is a rare disorder, but its specific prevalence is unknown. Approximately 200 families affected by the disorder have been identified worldwide.",GHR,hereditary neuralgic amyotrophy
